Package com.github.actionfx.core.container.instantiation

Class ControllerInstantiationSupplier<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.container.instantiation.AbstractInstantiationSupplier<T>
      • com.github.actionfx.core.container.instantiation.ControllerInstantiationSupplier<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Supplier<T>
    public class ControllerInstantiationSupplier<T>
extends AbstractInstantiationSupplier<T>
    Instantiation supplier for controller instances. This class is responsible for instantiating controller classes. In case that ActionFX is configured to use ActionFXEnhancer.EnhancementStrategy.SUBCLASSING as enhancement strategy, a dynamic sub-class is created for the supplied controller class by using the configured ActionFXEnhancer.
    Author:
    koster

      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ControllerInstantiationSupplier.OrderBasedAnnotatedMethodComparator<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
      Comparator implementation that orders methods according to the "order" attribute among same controls.

    • Method Detail

      • prepareControllerClass

        protected java.lang.Class<T> prepareControllerClass​(java.lang.Class<T> controllerClass)
        Prepares the controllerClass to use. In case the sub-classing enhancement strategy is configured, a dynamic sub-class is created by using the configure ActionFXEnhancer.
        Parameters:
        controllerClass - the controller class to prepare
        Returns:
        the prepared controller class, potentially sub-classes depending on the ActionFX configuration

        protected FxmlView createFxmlViewInstance​(java.lang.Object controller)
        Creates an FxmlView instance for the given controller.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller for that the view shall be created
        Returns:
        the created view

      • injectView

        protected void injectView​(T controller,
                          View view)
        Injects the view into the supplied controller. Please note that the controller is expected to be enhanced with a field of name "_view".
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller
        view - the view

      • applyMethodLevelEventAnnotations

        protected void applyMethodLevelEventAnnotations​(java.lang.Object instance,
                                                View view)
        Applies method-level annotations (e.g. AFXOnControlValueChange.
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance that is checked for ActionFX method level annotations
        view - the view that belongs to the controller

      • applyFieldLevelAnnotations

        protected void applyFieldLevelAnnotations​(java.lang.Object instance)
        Applies field-level annotations (e.g. AFXEnableMultiSelection.
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance that is checked for ActionFX field level annotations
